hotels.vendor_name: Peppers Beach Club & Spa Palm Cove
hotels.title: Coastal Chic Palm Cove Haven Overlooking the Beach with Lagoon-Style Pool, Swim-Up Bar & Restaurant
hotels.description: Go where the palm trees sway and the cocktails flow with a luxurious-meets-laid-back stay at Peppers Beach Club & Spa Palm Cove. Overlooking the beach, this haven boasts lush gardens, a lagoon-style pool and an onsite day spa - perfect for reaching the highest level of relaxation. Head out to explore the Daintree Rainforest or Great Barrier Reef, and return to enjoy a shared dining experience at Latin American cuisine specialists Mesa, or a sunset cocktail at sparkling swim up bar, On The Rocks.

hotels.vendor_name: Pullman Palm Cove Sea Temple Resort & Spa
hotels.title: Palm Cove Pullman Beachfront Escape with Three Swimming Pools & Onsite Day Spa
hotels.description: Find your slice of tropical paradise amid the vibrant gardens and sparkling pools at this five-star Palm Cove oasis. Famed for its expansive lagoon pools and coveted location on the southern end of Palm Cove, this tropical escape offers easy access to the Great Barrier Reef and Daintree Rainforest, and an unbeatable location just steps from the pristine beach. Feel relaxed as soon as you step into the resort’s Balinese-inspired spaces, spend lazy days by the pool, relax at the blissful Vie Day Spa, indulge in Asian delights at Temple of Tastes or sip on modern concoctions at Lagoon Bar.

hotels.title: Palm Cove Family-Friendly Apartment Luxury with Direct Beach Access & Spa Credit
hotels.description: Embrace the laidback ambience of Palm Cove in Tropical North Queensland at the Alamanda Palm Cove by Lancemore - the only property in the region with direct access to the beach. Experience indulgant tropical flavours and fresh, seasonal produce at NuNu restaurant, luxuriate with immersive wellness treatments at L.M. Spa and explore Palm Cove's famous esplanade with its island-on-the-mainland demeanour, incredible food scene and boutiques.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Adults-Only Palm Cove Escape Overlooking the Coral Sea
hotels.description: If you were ever contemplating a tropical escape to soak up the tranquil atmosphere within one of Queensland’s most loved spots, look no further than The Reef House Adults Retreat, stamped with a Travellers’ Choice Best of the Best - making it one of the top 1% of properties worldwide. Hugged by the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Daintree Rainforest on one side and turquoise waters of the Great Barrier Reef on the other, this award-winning boutique sanctuary offers spacious rooms and suites mere metres from the pristine white sands of Palm Cove Beach - and to even further sweeten the deal, it's adults only, meaning no guests under 17 are permitted. A stay at the charming The Reef House Adults Retreat is synonymous with romanticism and sophistication, and the little touches, like the dedicated Luxury Concierge and complimentary activities, including aqua aerobics, interactive 'Reef House Mixology' class, and unlimited use of the resort’s fishing rods or vintage-style cruiser bikes set this resort apart from the rest. You won’t need to look far for gourmet bites, with the Reef House Restaurant and Brigadier’s Bar & Lounge conveniently located onsite, and the iconic Reef House Spa is the place to go for moments of uninterrupted bliss.
